safari-request-permissions-warning.message: Finish setup to enable Adblock Plus

safari-request-permissions-desc.message: Follow these 3 steps to finish setup

safari-request-permissions-title-alt.message: The latest update of Adblock Plus requires some additional permissions to allow us to block more nuisance ads.

safari-request-permissions-instruction1.message: Tap on the review button at the top or the [[IMG:safari_menu_icon]] in the address bar

safari-request-permissions-instruction3.message: Then tap “Always Allow on Every Website“
